text:
$396 / 360日全方位服務：
🏡每30日30GB本地數據
✈️6GB大中華數據，隨時無障礙北上
⏳420日超長儲值卡有效期保障，唔怕過期*
📞防騙王服務，多一份安心
*自購買組合起計至少達420日
📢📢2024年12月31日或之前購買，優惠加碼：加送你3GB大中華數據。 加埋有9GB俾你360日歎住用。
trans:
$396/360 days full service:
🏡30GB local data every 30 days
✈️6GB Greater China data, for full access when heading north at any time
⏳The prepaid card has a super long 420-day validity period guarantee, so you won’t have to worry about expiration*
📞Anti-fraud service for more peace of mind
*At least 420 days from purchase of the package
📢📢Purchase on or before December 31, 2024 for addded bonus: you will get 3GB of Greater China data for free. There is an additional 9GB for you to use for 360 days.
